explains: n. 二分法；两分；分裂；双歧分枝

sentences.en: There is a dichotomy between the academic world and the industrial world.
sentences.cn: 学术界和工业界间有天壤之别。

sentences.en: A dichotomy may be defined as a Dedekind cut for a weak ordering.
sentences.cn: 二分法可以被定义为对弱排序的狄德金分割。

sentences.en: It constructs a kind of pallel sorting algorithm bitonic sorting net, taking advantage of dichotomy ideas and bitonic serial.
sentences.cn: 这使用了二分法思想，利用双调序列，构造出了一种并行的排序算法：双调排序网络。
